body.p:
Marietta, Georgia,
August 9" 1864
Gov. Thos. E. Bramlette,
Sir:-
I hereby earnestly recommend that 1st Lieut Edward H. Green, Company "E" 11" Ky. Vol. Cavalry be promoted Captain of said Company. vice Capt Frederick Slater, promoted Major.
Also 2d Lieut Dunn R. Stage, to be 1st Lieut of said company, vice, Lieut Green, promoted Captain.
Also, 1st Sergeant Solomon Huffman to be 2d Lieut of said Company, vice Lieut Stage promoted.
I make these recommendations fully estimating the worth and merrit of the Officers above recommended.

W. O. Boyle
Maj 11 Ky Cav Comdg

11 Cavy
